mapper.select: select nvl(count(*),0) from erpboard where ${searchKey} like '%' || #{searchValue} || '%'

select * from ( select rownum rnum, data.* from ( select boardNum,name,subject,hitCount,to_char(created,'YYYY-MM-DD') created from erpboard where ${searchKey} like '%' || #{searchValue} || '%' order by boardNum desc) data)
where rnum>=#{start} and rnum<=#{end}
mapper.update: update erpboard set hitCount=hitCount+1 where boardNum=#{boardNum}
mapper.select: select nvl(count(*),0) from erpboard where ${searchKey} like '%' || #{searchValue} || '%' and listNum=#{listNum}

select * from( select rownum rnum, data.* from( select * from erpboard where listNum=1 order by boardNum desc) data)
where rnum>=1 and rnum<=6
